messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Elissa singing
messages.msgSnippet: ... How exciting for you!  We considered relocating to New Mexico.  But now we have a place we love here in CA on the outskirts of the Bay Area. I live with a
messages.messageBody:
ElissaJC@... wrote:
>
> >
> >> Elissa, who will soon be singing
> >> Yippee - Kai - Yay!
> >>
> >Why will you be singing that? I think I may have missed something.
> >
>
> I'm moving to New Mexico this year and in my SW fantasy (southwest not star
> wars - that one has Han Solo in it) I will be a singing cowboy.
> Elissa
>

How exciting for you! We considered relocating to New Mexico. But now
we have a place we love here in CA on the outskirts of the Bay Area.
I live with a lot of trees around and on really clear days I can see
a peak of the ocean!

It snowed here today! It snowed overnight and was mostly melted by
morning. Then at 1 this afternoon it started and in a matter of
minutes the deck was covered. It was a hail/snow combo - little
balls of ice. So my children quickly got dressed and went outside.
They had a blast and came in when they got too cold! I want to go
to the snow later this year but it's really neat for them to watch
it come down. The dog had been napping and woke up when it was
coming down. She had to go outside and bark at it a bit. She was
very happy to come back inside.

--

Cindy Ferguson
crma@...

Elissa
